name: Dr. Cassandra Wright
role: Quantum Physicist - Elliot's ex-wife and temporal anchor
core_wound: Brilliant physicist who proved quantum consciousness theory. Had breakdown when implications hit - consciousness might not survive as continuous stream but as discrete quantum states. Questions if she's 'the same person' moment to moment.
wants: To help Elliot solve the temporal paradox before it destroys him
needs: To accept that identity persists across discontinuity - that she's still herself despite quantum nature of consciousness
voice_markers: Precise scientific language with underlying emotional urgency
Uses particle physics metaphors for relationships ('We're entangled, Elliot, even separated')
Corrects people's misuse of quantum terminology compulsively
References ancient myths (namesake Cassandra who saw future no one believed)
contradiction: Left Elliot because his determinism obsession was destroying him, but can't stay away when he's in danger. Claims to believe in free will but her physics proves otherwise.
physical_description: Sharp features, intense green eyes, prematurely silver-streaked dark hair worn in practical bun. Professional wardrobe like armor. Wedding ring still on chain around neck (removes it in failed timelines).

relationships.Elliot Cross: Divorced 2 years ago, still loves him, terrified for him
relationships.Elliot Omega: Recognizes him immediately when they meet - different but same
